name: Construct RPG
description:
Artificial Construct for RPG game synthesis 

Artificial Construct is a game stripped of all content coupled with a Free Form scripting language:

https://www.researchgate.net/publication/361418125_Free_Form_Programming_Languag...

to allow the designers and players to create their own highly customized and infinitely variational  and in this  case RPG games.

Instructions to see samples:

1. Create a new account with user name and pass and leave group blank

2. for gameid enter 

ccn/dara/trigs

ccn/adam/3rd

ccn/adam/2nd
